title: The Art of Political Lying - primary purpose

content.question: The author's primary purpose in the passage is to

choices.label: show how behavior that is widely condemned as vicious is a source of national prosperity
express resignation about the resistance of successful liars to attempts to reform them
trivialize the friendships of a self-serving political elite
disparage a vice and explain how it has flourished

content.answer: disparage a vice and explain how it has flourished

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
